abstract: Entomologist Michael L May of Rutgers studies sex lives of dragonflies, who have dizzyingly complicated and varied reproductive organs.
snippet: Dragonflies have dizzyingly complicated and varied reproductive organs, and figuring out how they fit together is the goal of Michael L. May, a Rutgers entomologist.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey

lead_paragraph: Dragonflies have dizzyingly complicated and varied reproductive organs, and figuring out how they fit together is the goal of Michael L. May, a Rutgers entomologist.

headline.main: It’s Complicated: Dragonfly Love Comes Calling
